若虫: (わかむし) - nymph (immature form of an insect)
若衆: (わかしゅう) - young man (in the Edo period, esp. one with forelocks who has not yet had his coming-of-age ceremony); young male prostitute/young kabuki actor (who may also act as a homosexual prostitute); younger partner in a homosexual relationship
若衆歌舞伎: (わかしゅかぶき) - young men's kabuki
若衆道: (わかしゅどう) - male homosexuality; pederasty
若輩: (じゃくはい) - young person; inexperienced person; novice
若輩者: (じゃくはいもの) - fledgling; junior member; young person; inexperienced person; novice
若返り: (わかがえり) - rejuvenation; restoration of youth
若返る: (わかがえる) - to be rejuvenated; to feel young again
若頭: (わかがしら) - leader of a crime syndicate's henchmen; young leading subordinate in yakuza group
若鳥丼: (わかどりどん) - young chicken on rice
若鷺: (ワカサギ) - Japanese pond smelt (Hypomesus nipponensis)
苦: (ku/kuru/niga) - suffer , pain, anguish, suffering, distress, anxiety, worry, trouble, difficulty, hardship; duhkha (suffering)
苦々しい: (にがにがしい) - unpleasant; disgusting; loathsome; shameful; scandalous
苦しい: (くるしい) - painful/difficult/agonizing; needy/tight (budget)/straitened (circumstances); forced (smile, joke)/lame (excuse)/strained (interpretation); awkward (situation)/painful (position); (often ぐるしい)  (after masu stem) hard to do/unpleasant
苦しい懐: (くるしいふところ) - tight budget
苦しい時の神頼み: (くるしいときのかみだのみ) - danger past, God forgotten
苦しい言い訳: (くるしいいいわけ) - lame (poor) excuse
苦しがる: (くるしがる) - to suffer; to complain of a pain
苦しさ: (くるしさ) - pain; anguish; distress; suffering; hardship
苦しみ: (くるしみ) - pain; anguish; distress; suffering; hardship
苦しむ: (くるしむ) - to suffer; to groan; to be worried
苦しめる: (くるしめる) - to torment/to pain/to inflict (physical) pain/to hurt; to harass/to cause (emotional) pain/to afflict/to distress/to bother/to trouble/to stump/to baffle
苦しゅうない: (くるしゅうない) - no problem; no objection; it doesn't matter
苦になる: (くになる) - to be bothered (by something); to suffer
苦に病む: (くにやむ) - to worry; to suffer
苦は楽の種: (くはらくのたね) - one cannot have pleasure without pain; no pain, no gain
苦みばしった: (にがみばしった) - sternly handsome; manly
苦る: (にがる) - to feel bitter; to scowl
苦労: (kurou) - problema, dificuldade, labor, esforço, dores; ansiedade, preocupação, cuidado
苦労し抜く: (くろうしぬく) - to go through all sorts of hardships
苦労性: (くろうしょう) - nervous temperament; worry habit; pessimistic nature
苦吟: (くぎん) - laborious composition; struggling to compose a poem
苦味ばしった: (にがみばしった) - sternly handsome; manly
苦味走った: (にがみばしった) - sternly handsome; manly
苦塩: (にがしお) - bittern; concentrated solution of salts (esp. magnesium chloride) left over after the crystallization of seawater or brine
苦境: (くきょう) - trouble; crisis; predicament; squeeze; pinch
苦学: (くがく) - paying one's own school expenses by working
苦学力行: (くがくりっこう) - (yoji) strenuous pursuit of learning under difficulties
苦寒: (くかん) - coldest time of the year; bitter suffering
苦心: (くしん) - pain; trouble; anxiety; diligence; hard work
苦心を買われる: (くしんをかわれる) - to have one's labor appreciated (labour)
苦心惨憺: (くしんさんたん) - (yoji) taking great pains
苦心談: (くしんだん) - account of the hardships one has encountered
苦患: (くげん) - hellish pain; suffering; distress; agony
苦情: (くじょう) - complaint; troubles; objection; grievance
苦情処理機関: (くじょうしょりきかん) - grievance machinery; complaints department
苦情調査官: (くじょうちょうさかん) - ombudsman
苦手: (nigate) - ruim em, fraco em, não muito bom em; não é a praia de alguém, não é o favorito de alguém
苦手意識: (にがていしき) - awareness that somebody will be hard to deal with; awareness that one is not good at something; (feeling) not up to doing something
苦有れば楽有り: (くあればらくあり) - No cross, no crown
苦楽: (くらく) - pleasure and pain; joys and sorrows
苦汁: (にがり) - bittern; concentrated solution of salts (esp. magnesium chloride) left over after the crystallization of seawater or brine
苦汁をなめる: (くじゅうをなめる) - to have a bitter experience
苦汁を嘗める: (くじゅうをなめる) - to have a bitter experience
苦汁を舐める: (くじゅうをなめる) - to have a bitter experience
苦況: (くきょう) - trouble; crisis; predicament; squeeze; pinch
苦渋: (くじゅう) - bitterness; mortification; difficulty in understanding; distress; affliction
苦渋をなめる: (くじゅうをなめる) - to have a bitter experience
苦渋を嘗める: (くじゅうをなめる) - to have a bitter experience
苦渋を舐める: (くじゅうをなめる) - to have a bitter experience
苦無: (くない) - ninja throwing knives; (orig. meaning) mediaeval farming tool for digging, prying, etc.
苦瓜: (ニガウリ) - bitter melon (Momordica charantia); bitter gourd
苦界: (くがい) - world of suffering; life of prostitution
苦界に身を沈める: (くがいにみをしずめる) - to become a prostitute (sink into a brothel)
